metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon's Tax Liabilities and Collection Obligations
Amazon is subject to a variety of taxes in the United States at federal and state levels.
Amazon is subject to a variety of taxes in numerous foreign jurisdictions.
Amazon is subject to tax collection obligations in the United States at federal and state levels.
Amazon is subject to tax collection obligations in numerous foreign jurisdictions.
Amazon may recognize additional tax expense due to changes in laws.
Amazon may recognize additional tax expense due to changes in regulations.
Amazon may recognize additional tax expense due to changes in administrative practices.
Amazon may recognize additional tax expense due to changes in principles.
Amazon may recognize additional tax expense due to changes in interpretations related to tax.
Amazon may be subject to additional tax liabilities due to changes in laws.
Amazon may be subject to additional tax liabilities due to changes in regulations.
Amazon may be subject to additional tax liabilities due to changes in administrative practices.
Amazon may be subject to additional tax liabilities due to changes in principles.
Amazon may be subject to additional tax liabilities due to changes in interpretations related to tax.
Amazon may be subject to additional liabilities for tax collection obligations due to changes in laws.
Amazon may be subject to additional liabilities for tax collection obligations due to changes in regulations.
Amazon may be subject to additional liabilities for tax collection obligations due to changes in administrative practices.
Amazon may be subject to additional liabilities for tax collection obligations due to changes in principles.
Amazon may be subject to additional liabilities for tax collection obligations due to changes in interpretations related to tax.
Changes to tax laws could come about as a result of economic conditions.
Changes to tax laws could come about as a result of political conditions.
Changes to tax laws could come about as a result of other conditions.
An increasing number of jurisdictions are considering laws that impose new tax measures targeting online commerce.
An increasing number of jurisdictions are considering laws that impose new tax measures targeting the remote selling of goods and services.
An increasing number of jurisdictions have adopted laws that impose new tax measures targeting online commerce.
An increasing number of jurisdictions have adopted laws that impose new tax measures targeting the remote selling of goods and services.
An increasing number of jurisdictions are considering administrative practices that impose new tax measures targeting online commerce.
An increasing number of jurisdictions are considering administrative practices that impose new tax measures targeting the remote selling of goods and services.
An increasing number of jurisdictions have adopted administrative practices that impose new tax measures targeting online commerce.
An increasing number of jurisdictions have adopted administrative practices that impose new tax measures targeting the remote selling of goods and services.
Some jurisdictions are considering or have adopted revenue-based taxes targeting online commerce.
Some jurisdictions are considering or have adopted revenue-based taxes targeting the remote selling of goods and services.
Changes to the global tax framework may result in additional tax expense for Amazon.
Changes to competition laws may result in additional tax expense for Amazon.
Changes to accounting rules in various jurisdictions may result in additional tax expense for Amazon.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/

text:
##### We Face Additional Tax Liabilities and Collection Obligations

We are subject to a variety of taxes and tax collection obligations in the U.S. (federal and state) and numerous foreign jurisdictions. We may recognize additional tax expense and be subject to additional tax liabilities, including other liabilities for tax collection obligations due to changes in laws, regulations, administrative practices, principles, and interpretations related to tax, including changes to the global tax framework, competition, and other laws and accounting rules in various jurisdictions. Such changes could come about as a result of economic, political, and other conditions. An increasing number of jurisdictions are considering or have adopted laws or administrative practices that impose new tax measures, including revenue-based taxes, targeting online commerce and the remote selling of goods and services.
